entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
